description: CENSUS_SUBDIVISION_ID: Foreign Key, linking to CENSUS_SUBDIVISION_ID in CEN_CENSUS_SUBDIVISIONS_SP, e.g., 5901022
CENSUS_YEAR: is the census year that the data is collected. e.g., 2006, 2011. This field combining with CENSUS_SUBDIVISION_ID is the primary key
CLAB_ID: is a Canada Lands Administrative Boundary (CLAB) unique identifier. e.g., 00009. This is a foreign key to WHSE_ADMIN_BOUNDARIES.CLAB_INDIAN_RESERVES.
ID of electrical utility that serves the given community
ID of gas utility that serves the community
ID of primary phone company that serves the community
ID of primary cable company that serves the community
